resources.string: Procedural Thinking involves creating perfectly clear and unambiguous instructions for a computer to follow. Is that correct?
Abstract Thinking means finding similarity, or as programmers would say, generality amongst seemigly different things. Is that Correct?
Before source code can be compiled, it has to be ___ ?
Which of the following are a programming language? WARNING! More than one right answer!

Systems Thinking happens when you break a big problem down into smaller pieces. It involves big-picture thinking and decision making about a problem and how different pieces of a program can work together to solve it. Is that correct?
Computer empathy is the ability to understand what ____ is, how it works, and what its good and bad at doing. Please fill in the empty word:
Which of these are programmers tools? WARNING! More than one right answer!
Debugging is a systematic process of relentlessly identifying the cause of a computer program that doesnt work. Do you agree with that statement?
